positive_examples: This is an example of glutamate.
We observed glutamate in this context.
A typical case of glutamate would involve these features.
The concept of glutamate applies here.
The most abundant excitatory neurotransmitter in the nervous system, essential for synaptic plasticity and learning.
negative_examples: This is an example of dopamine, not glutamate.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Dopamine, or other types of Neurotransmitter

definition: The most abundant excitatory neurotransmitter in the vertebrate nervous system.
